title: What games trigger you the most when you mess up?
body:
I think I die everytime I misclick in FTL. And that is a lot of times. My brother plays old school RS and I watched him prayer flick perfectly for like 30 minutes straight on a level 76 combat iron man he had only to miss one of the last ones before getting his lava(magma? The more difficult one) cape. I've never seen nerd rage that real in all my life..

So what game tilts you off the face of the earth if you mess up? Inb4 dark souls
